p: We analyzed 366 previously unpublished HIV-1 pol sequences (positions in HXB2 K03455: 2253–3364) collected in Abuja, Nigeria between 2006–2011, together with all Nigerian pol sequences from the corresponding genetic region available in the Los Alamos HIV-1 sequence database (N = 1076, http://www.hiv.lanl.gov/, Table 1). All sequences without date and location of sampling were excluded. However, contact with all relevant research centers was made in order to obtain such missing information.
